indicator_name: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita
national_indicator_description: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita
target_name: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries
goal_name: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
source_organisation_1: Elaborated by SADEI based on data from the sources detailed in the methodology
graph_title: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita
